item.title: How to choose right scope for a test
item.description: Test scope introduction Rather talk about specific definition of test scope let’s review list of different test types ordered from higher to lower scope. Basically, the more things like methods, endpoints, databases, services, apps are involved in test the higher is scope. How to choose right scope for test There is no clear recommendation how to choose scope for test. Instead of reeling on approximate count concept like test pyramid which inherently makes sense, but besides there are definitely more things that should be considered while choosing test type.
